column4: I set up one dapper box and used dd to set up 2 others - I've now upgraded one box to hardy and want to use its' /var/cache/apt/archives to upgrade the other two boxes - is this possible?
Yes, although in the future you might want to look into apt-proxy
Either do it manually, or take the easy route, and use AptOnCD
thnx - is it a matter of copying the folder to the other boxes and sudo update & upgrade?
